Package org.yourcompany.yourproject.Frontend

Class BoardHelper

java.lang.Object
org.yourcompany.yourproject.Frontend.BoardHelper
public class BoardHelper extends Object
View Service for managing the canvas view and visual representation Handles rendering, gate selection, visual feedback, and input/output display

    • addGateView

      public DrawGates addGateView(GateComponent gate, int x, int y)
      Adds a gate view to the canvas.
      Parameters:
      gate - The gate component to add
      x - The x-coordinate position
      y - The y-coordinate position
      Returns:
      The created DrawGates view component

    • removeGateView

      public void removeGateView(DrawGates gateView)
      Removes a gate view from the canvas.
      Parameters:
      gateView - The gate view to remove

    • selectGate

      public void selectGate(DrawGates gate)
      Selects a gate view and provides visual feedback.
      Parameters:
      gate - The gate view to select, or null to deselect

    • getSelectedGate

      Get the currently selected gate

      Updates wire views on the canvas based on the provided connectors.
      Parameters:
      connectors - The list of connectors to display

    • removeWire

      Removes a wire view from the canvas.
      Parameters:
      wire - The wire view to remove

    • startConnection

      public void startConnection(DrawGates sourceGate, int sourcePort, Point startPoint)
      Starts connection mode for creating a wire from an output port.
      Parameters:
      sourceGate - The source gate view
      sourcePort - The output port index on the source gate
      startPoint - The starting point for the connection

    • updateConnectionEnd

      public void updateConnectionEnd(Point endPoint)
      Updates the temporary wire end point during connection creation.
      Parameters:
      endPoint - The current end point of the temporary wire

    • endConnection

      public void endConnection()
      End connection mode

    • isConnecting

      public boolean isConnecting()
      Checks if currently in connection mode.
      Returns:
      true if a connection is being created, false otherwise

    • getSourceGateForConnection

      public DrawGates getSourceGateForConnection()
      Gets the source gate for the current connection.
      Returns:
      The source gate view, or null if not connecting

    • getSourcePortForConnection

      public int getSourcePortForConnection()
      Gets the source port index for the current connection.
      Returns:
      The source port index, or -1 if not connecting

    • paintTemporaryConnection

      g - The Graphics object for painting

    • hasLitLEDs

      public boolean hasLitLEDs()
      Checks if any LED in the circuit is currently lit.
      Returns:
      true if at least one LED is lit, false otherwise
